name: Cute Ninja
description:
Little Game made for the Wowie Jam 3.0  #WowieJam3 in 2 days.

Help a little ninja girl called Akira  to survive the traps.

To move use the keyboard  or Gamepad.

Arrows => Move and jump

Ctrl or Space : Use Sword

Credits:

  • Design, Development and Graphics
    Mauro Rilla - https://misterm.itch.io
    Music: https://patrickdearteaga.com
